definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
numeral-classifier compound (e.g. 一次、三套、五本 etc)
verbal classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word applying mainly to verbs
nominal classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word applying mainly to nouns

sentences.english: This next example shows how backtracking works with repetition quantifiers.
sentences.chinese: 下一個例子顯示了帶重複量詞的回溯。

sentences.english: To tell you the truth, I have seen lots of them.
sentences.chinese: 說花的量詞真話她們中很多人我都見過。

sentences.english: The sentences in the construction are its instantiations and elaborations.
sentences.chinese: 這類句子例示或詳述的是雙數量詞構式。

sentences.english: One of the characteristics of Chinese language is its colorfulness in classifiers.
sentences.chinese: 具有豐富多彩的量詞是漢語的特色之一。

sentences.english: There are plenty of common characteristics in noun classifiers of Sino-Tibetan languages.
sentences.chinese: 漢藏語名量詞存在着大量的共性特徵。

sentences.english: Question: When speaking of umbrella and fan, which quantifier do we use?
sentences.chinese: 說到傘和扇子的時候，我們會用到哪個量詞呢？

sentences.english: Now let's talk about using quantifiers to indicate repetition.
sentences.chinese: 現在讓我們來談論使用量詞表明重複。

sentences.english: Anomalous collocation of quantifier and noun is a kind of language innovation.
sentences.chinese: 量詞與名詞超常搭配是一種反常合道的語言創新現象。

sentences.english: Nesting quantifiers is not actually a performance hazard in and of itself.
sentences.chinese: 嵌套量詞本身並不會造成性能危害。

sentences.english: The quantifier in Chinese is one part of speech to express the quantity unit.
sentences.chinese: 現代漢語量詞是用來表示數量單位的一種詞類。

sentences.english: Body words are changed into measure words by means of metaphor.
sentences.chinese: 人體詞的量詞化是在隱喻或轉喻的機制下完成的。

sentences.english: Quantifiers that allow you to specify the number of occurrences of a subpatterns.
sentences.chinese: 量詞，可以用量詞指定子模式出現的次數。

sentences.english: Discussion is made on the select arts for translating Chinese quantifiers into English.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了漢語量詞的英譯選擇藝術。

sentences.english: What kind of measure word should I use instead?
You can put a noun after a quantifier when you are talking about members of a group in general…
sentences.chinese: 當提到一般的羣體成員時，用數量詞修飾名詞。
